Reviews.Title: “Cheap hotel, but too far out. Great staff.”
Reviews.Author: spreekitik
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights paid bed ok size aircon perfectly quiet nights rest cons shower hotel town rome regional train 40 mins termini station party tip youre late night check regional train schedule trains 2250 weekdays saturday 2210 sundays hire taxi rome itll cost 20 eur

Reviews.Title: “Do NOT stay at this dive- it isn't even in Rome”
Reviews.Author: holidayarris
Reviews.Content: seriously booked package aware little city landing airport anytime 8pm taxi terminus rail station hotel taxi cost throughout journey driver kept saying staying isnt rome hotel horrible dont consider fussy smelt damp creaking mattress didn’t people friendly unlike forum breakfast expect backpackers hostel stayed night immediately found hotel central happy stay awful waste time money staying suggest don’t mistake

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Staff but not so nicer hotel”
Reviews.Author: TravelBugMandy
Reviews.Content: travelled cousin girls city break rome london checking hotel late shown beds werent toilet dirty reception nicer suite lot larger jacuzzi bath dirty underwear bathroom floor told receptionist managed checked bed facilities clean clean italian reception desk morning helpful train station days proper italian gelato hotel 2 minute walk train station cross quiet busy road taking children bit careful trains rome frequent wait 57 minutes lot cheaper london except bedroom mix morning else fine staff extremely friendly cute backpackers

Reviews.Title: “There must be better places to stay in Rome.”
Reviews.Author: Zingle Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights moved prepaid cleaner bedroom window huge storm rain poured suitcase clothes shoes books electronics little damp allow dry totally unpack suitcase spread available dry space reception managed hang clothes morning requested carpet soaked downgraded suitcase wet move obviously apologize inconvenience caused unable obtain email address manager impression totally indifferent situation

Reviews.Title: “Our 3rd Visit To Hotel Flaminius”
Reviews.Author: UsaTraveler20
Reviews.Content: true word wife stay 10 days weeks july 2010 hotel economical easy inexpensive train ride piazza del popolo metro train 1 euro takes 18 minutes arrive center rome walk famous sites grab metro piazza del popolo 1 euro ticket 75 minutes clean kept daily beds fine included breakfast satisfying air conditioning trip visit noticed guests appears successful bringing tour passing rome fabio day manager helpful hotel workers internet access lobby suggestion upgrade computer monitor current system television stations english speaking channel bbc hoping cnn maybe time rome recomend visit museum called villa borghese wonderful recomend avoid real lines book tours advance via internet example vatican museum tour look forward visit rome

HotelInfo.Name: Flaminius Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Frassineto 21-23, 00188 Rome, Italy
